alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 26 at 9:49PM EDT until May 27 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM EDT SATURDAY THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast North Carolina, including Brunswick, New Hanover, and Pender counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM EDT Saturday through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are expected Saturday with local amounts up to 7 inches possible. Heavy rain could cause flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should closely monitor this potentially dangerous weather situation. Be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued for your area, and never drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
